content: here s an easy beginner friendly crochet top/dress summer this pattern is a bit of a two for one you can make a dress a halter top or both this pattern includes an 9 page written pattern and photo tutorial as well as a link to the video tutorial to make it as smooth as possible this pattern includes us women s sizes xs-xxl any questions you may come across in making this pattern will be answered inside but if not feel free to message me materials #3 light weight/dk weight yarn i used lion brand truboo #3 light/dk weight yarn color pictured = mushroom crochet hook size 3 5 mm scissors yarn needle notes this crochet pattern is made as us women s sizes xs s m l xl xxl this crochet pattern is made in two panels front and back panels are made the same for the skirt we ll crochet in round this crochet pattern is made from the top down in this picture i have demonstrated with size small yarn needed halter top version = 370 390 430 450 490 510 yards dress version = 860 950 1 040 1 130 1 220 1 310 yards gauge blocked 16 50 double_crochet x 10 row = 4 measurements after blocked the halter top version xs = 30 54 body circumference x 13 60 long s = 32 48 body circumference x 13 60 long m = 34 42 body circumference x 14 40 long l = 37 33 body circumference x 14 40 long xl = 39 27 body circumference x 15 20 long xxl = 41 21 body circumference x 15 20 long the dress version xs = 30 54 body circumference x 46 54 hip circumference x 26 40 long s = 32 48 body circumference x 49 45 hip circumference x 26 80 long m = 34 42 body circumference x 52 36 hip circumference x 28 long l = 37 33 body circumference x 56 72 hip circumference x 28 40 long xl = 39 27 body circumference x 59 63 hip circumference x 29 60 long xxl = 41 21 body circumference x 62 54 hip circumference x 30 long thanks for stopping by happy crocheting
